title: Maggie L Walker National Historic Site: Park Home
body: Determined Spirit  Maggie Walker devoted her life to civil rights advancement, economic empowerment, and educational opportunities for Jim Crow-era African Americans and women. As a bank president, newspaper editor, and fraternal leader, Walker served as an inspiration of pride and progress. Today, Walkerâ€™s home is preserved as a tribute to her enduring legacy of vision, courage, and determination.              Portrait of Maggie L. Walker   Portrait of Maggie L. Walker
